    • Method Detail

      • process

        public String process(String input)
        Description copied from interface: BuiltIn
        Will manipulate input. The returned value is the one ultimately displayed in a template. For instance here: ${article.text esc} the value article.text, esc is a name of a built-in and a returned value from a built-in is merged into template.
        Specified by:
        process in interface BuiltIn
        Parameters:
        input - value passed to template for merging
        Returns:
        value passed to template for merging after processing by this built-in
